scripts.postinstall: pnpm install-client && pnpm install-server && pnpm install-envoy
scripts.start-envoy: cd src/envoy && docker run --rm --name my-envoy-container -p 9901:9901 -p 9090:9090 -p 8080:8080 my-envoy-image
scripts.start: pnpm install && concurrently pnpm:start-client pnpm:start-server pnpm:start-envoy
